display-tester.title: Display Tester

instructions.solidColors: Use solid color backgrounds to detect dead and stuck pixels. Look carefully for any abnormal pixels on the screen.
instructions.grayscale: Test your monitor's grayscale transitions and contrast. Check for color banding or uneven areas.
instructions.gradient: Check if color gradients are smooth without visible banding.
instructions.grid: Check pixel alignment and screen geometry. Grid lines should be straight and evenly distributed.
instructions.responseTime: Test screen response time. Watch for ghosting or blur on moving squares.

tips.title: Testing Tips
tips.tip1: Test in a dark room for best results
tips.tip2: Observe each color for at least 10-15 seconds
tips.tip3: View the screen from different angles
tips.tip5: If you find a dead pixel, try gently pressing the area (sometimes it can fix it)
